product_name: The North Face Base Camp Duffel Special Edition - Large - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Special Edition Base Camp duffel in large offers rugged resilience like the standard version, but features deluxe embossed shell material, leather trim and metal hardware.
short_description: The Special Edition Base Camp duffel in large offers rugged resilience like the standard version, but features deluxe embossed shell material, leather trim and metal hardware.
